raw_df[[col]][raw_df[[col]] %in% new_levels] <- NA_character_\n    }\n  }\n\n# the synthetic playground competitions seem to perform better when numerics are also included as factors\nall_df <-\n names()\n\n\n```\n\nNominal features:\n\n`r nom_features`\n\nNumeric features: \n\n`r num_features`\n\nLogical features: \n\n`r logical_features`\n\n\nSize of the combined train and competition           knitr::kable()\n                   \ntrain_df %>% \n    select(all_of(features)) %>%\n    slice_sample(n = 2000) %>%\n    naniar::vis_miss()          \n\nnaniar::gg_miss_var(train_df %>%           \n```\n\n## Duplicated\n\nIs this competition transaction already in the training data with a correct label?\n\n```{r}\n#| label: duplicates\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\nall_df             \n           \n                \n# Machine Learning {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}\n\n\n## Recipe\n\n```{r}\n#| label: recipe\n                   \nrec <- recipe(\n    \n    formula(paste0(\"depression ~ \", \n               str_c(features,  collapse = \" + \"))),\n    data = train_df\n  ) %>% \n\n  step_novel(all_nominal_predictors())  %>% \n  \n  step_ratio(work_pressure, age, denom = denom_vars(job_satisfaction)) %>% \n  step_ratio(cgpa, denom = denom_vars(academic_pressure)) %>% \n\n  step_zv(all_predictors())\n\n                   \nfolds <- vfold_cv(train_df, \n                  v = 3,\n                  repeats = 3,\n                  strata = depression)    \n                   \nctrl <- finetune::control_race(event_level = \"second\", save_pred = TRUE)                               \n                                     \n```\n\n## Lightgbm\n\n```{r}\n#| label: lgbm\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\n#| fig.width: 12\n\nboost_tree_lgbm_spec <- \n  boost_tree(\n    trees = 2e3L,\n   tree_depth = tune(),\n   learn_rate =  0.015,\n   min_n = tune(),\n#   mtry = tune(),\n   loss_reduction = tune()\n  ) %>% \n  set_engine(engine = \"lightgbm\",\n             is_unbalance = TRUE,\n             num_leaves = tune(),\n             num_threads = cores\n       #      boosting = \"goss\"   # this may slow the runtime\n             ) %>%\n  set_mode(mode = \"classification\") \n                   \nwf <- workflow(rec,\n               boost_tree_lgbm_spec) \n\nparam <- wf %>%\n   extract_parameter_set_dials() %>%\n   recipes::update(\n#      trees = trees(range = c(1500, 3000)),\n      min_n = min_n(range = c(70,160)),\n      tree_depth = tree_depth(range = c(50,200)),\n#      learn_rate = learn_rate(range = c(-1.8,-0.8)),\n      num_leaves = num_leaves(range = c(500,1200)),\n      loss_reduction = loss_reduction(range = c(-10,-7))\n   ) %>%\n   dials::finalize(raw_df)                 \n                 \nlgbm_rs <- finetune::tune_race_win_loss(\n  wf,\n  grid = 30,\n  resamples = folds,\n  control = ctrl,\n  metrics = metric_set(accuracy),\n  param_info = param)\n\nfinetune::plot_race(lgbm_rs)\n                   \nshow_best(lgbm_rs, metric = \"accuracy\")  \n\nautoplot(lgbm_rs)\n\n\n```\n\n# Performance {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}\n\n## Confusion Matrix                   \n\nAcross the training data resample folds, how well did all of our models do?\n\n```{r}\n#| label: confusion matrix                \ncollect_predictions(lgbm_rs) %>%\n  conf_mat(depression, .pred_class) %>%\n  pluck(1) %>%\n  as_tibble() %>%\n  ggplot(aes(Truth, Prediction, alpha = n)) +\n  geom_tile(show.legend = FALSE, fill = \"steelblue\") +\n  geom_text(\n    aes(label = n),\n    size = 7,\n    show.legend = FALSE\n  ) \n                   \ncollect_metrics(lgbm_rs) %>% \n  filter(.metric == \"accuracy\") %>% \n  mutate(.config = fct_reorder(.config, mean)) %>% \n  ggplot(aes(mean, .config)) +\n  geom_point() +\n  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin = mean - std_err, xmax = mean + std_err)) +\n  labs(title = \"Accuracy across resample folds with std_err\")\n```\n\n## Importance\n```{r }                   \n#| label: importance\n#| warning: false\n#| message: false\n                   \nbest_accuracy <-   select_best(lgbm_rs, metric = \"accuracy\")                 \n                   \nfinal_lgbm <- wf %>%\n    finalize_workflow(best_accuracy) \n                  \nclassification_fit <- final_lgbm %>%\n                        fit(train_df) \n\naugment(classification_fit, train_df) %>% \n  conf_mat(depression, .pred_class) %>%\n  yardstick:::autoplot.conf_mat(type = \"heatmap\")\n\nclassification_fit |> \n  extract_fit_engine() |> \n  lightgbm::lgb.importance() |> \n  as_tibble() %>% \n  ggplot(aes(x = Gain, y = fct_reorder(Feature, Gain))) +\n  geom_col() +\n  labs(title = \"Feature Importance\", x = \"Gain\", y = NULL, caption = \"LightGBM Model | Visual: Jim Gruman\")                    \n                    \n```\n                   \n# Submission\n                   \n```{r}\n#| label:
